ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to simple multi-series financial charts, with a Candlestick chart rendering OHLC data and three line series rendering Moving Average indicators
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to add Contours to a Heatmap chart. Contours are provided by the [b]FastUniformContourRenderableSeries[/b]. This uses the same data-source the Heatmap: a 2D double[,] array.
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastCandlestickRenderableSeries.html']FastCandlestickRenderableSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.OhlcDataSeries%602.html']OhlcDataSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/17190/29/categorydatetimeaxis-vs-datetimeaxis']CategoryDateTimeAxis vs. NumericAxis[/url] - [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/List/Index/28']RenderableSeries API[/url]
